message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the fact that we both lose money as time passes.
Your offer was a good starting point, Alice.  I'm proposing a slightly better deal for me recognizing the impact of inflation on both our ends. Let's settle this quickly.
I understand the impact of inflation, Bob, but your last offer was a bit too tilted in your favor. This is a more reasonable split considering the time pressure.
Alice, this back and forth isn't helping anyone. We're both losing money with every wasted round. Let's split it evenly and end this right here.
